| History                 = The Black Bile clan is one of the tribes of [[Dark Elves]] of [[Svartalfheim]].{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #25}}

Their leaders are known as the Lords of the [[Hounds of the Hunter (Earth-616)|Wild Hunt]], as they bred massive hound dogs.{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #25}}

[[File:Black Bile Clan (Earth-616) from Thor God of Thunder Vol 1 25 0001.jpg|thumb|left|280px| [[Malekith (Earth-616)|Malekith]] taken by the [[Undertakers Elves of the Southern Swamps (Earth-616)|Undertakers Elves]] of the [[Southern Swamps]]]]
Many of that clan members died during the [[Forty-Third Troll War]], including thirteen brothers and twelve sons of one of those brothers. His wife sold her last son [[Malekith (Earth-616)|Malekith]] sold to the [[Undertakers Elves of the Southern Swamps (Earth-616)|Undertakers Elves]] of the [[Southern Swamps]] on the nineteenth years of the war, in exchange for food to her [[Hounds of the Hunter (Earth-616)|hounds of the Wild Hunt]], for him to become a corpse burner instead of a soldier.{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #25}}

Malekith grew grim in doing his labor, was captured by the [[Rock Trolls (Orange-Skinned)|Trolls]] met a wizard who trained him, and whom he killed when he asked Malekith to help him defeat war (as war defined the young Malekith).{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #25}}

Before dying, the wizard marked Malekith, with half of his face black. Malekith then returned to his mother, took control of the Wild Hunt and had them eat her.{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #25}}
